thread.title: Tziporah takes aim at Kris Smith
thread.title_full: Tziporah takes aim at Kris Smith

title: Tziporah takes aim at Kris Smith

organizations.name: kris smith share on twitter  tziporah malkah

text:
Share on Twitter 
TZIPORAH Malkah has labelled Kris Smith an anti-Semite and a chauvinist. 
The former model, previously known as Kate Fischer, fell out with 38-year-old Smith over a series of incidents in the South African jungle camp on I’m A Celebrity … Get Me Out Of Here! 
“You are playing the victim card again,” Smith told former model Malkah after she declared: “I’m a target, what can I say, people hate Jews.” 
Smith responded: “You give as good as you get. You give a lot of people s**t purposely.” 
Malkah, 43, has been one of the most controversial characters on the celebrity reality show, standing her ground over a number of issues and having heated arguments with the likes of Lisa Curry and Natalie Bassingthwaighte. 
JUNGLE DIET: Celebrities stripped of the pounds Tziporah Malkah has labelled Kris Smith an anti-Semite and a chauvinist. Picture: Channel 10 Source: Supplied 
“Kris just imagines I am an evil person because he is an anti-Semite,” she said. “He is a chauvinist as well.” 
Speaking to the camp Tok Tokki producers later, she clarified: “I know that everyone doesn’t hate Jews but I just say that for effect. I just thought we were having a bit of banter and I don’t think I over reacted to the banter at all, I think I took it quite well.” 
She added: “You’re having a go at me, having a go at Ash (Pollard) are you enjoying throwing your big penis around?” 
Smith wasn’t interested when Malkah attempted to clear the “bad blood” between the pair. 
“You are just rude,” he said. 
SEX MAGNET: Gay guys find me attractive says Smith Kris Smith wasn’t impressed with what Tziporah Malkah had to say. Picture: Nigel Wright/Channel Ten Source: Channel 10 
“You don’t say that to me and just think it will just blow over in 20 minutes. That is a really ignorant, rude, selfish and offensive thing to say to someone. I have no desire to speak to you at all Tziporah. Nobody calls me an anti-Semite when you know nothing about my family or my friends and then you call me a chauvinist. I have zero desire to speak to you again after that.” 
Meanwhile, heavy rain continues to keep production of the reality show on alert after the trial area was flooded on Sunday. 'I'm A Celebrity' trials area flooded and evacuated 1:22 
The effects of flooding rain have caused the trials area to be flooded and evacuated and had to be relocated on 'I'm A Celebrity...Get Me Out Of Here'. February 20th 2017
